*Infectra stands up and follows the Radicons* Infectra: I want you to show =
everything importent. Every detail please. *Infectra says to the Radicons*
=
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
  Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 4:39 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  "Ok=
ay, Airbomber will teach you about some stuff first." Train Wreck said.

  =
"Okay, we are on the planet Earth, we are with the Maximlas, and we are try=
ing to destroy the Predacons and Alliance, but however, right now we are at=
 truce, so our enemies are the Newcomers right now." Airbomber said.

  "Ye=
ah, Airbomber got it right, stupid truce. Well, anyway, to be successful in=
 the Neo Beast Wars, you have to know the fine arts, come outside and let u=
s show you." Stranato said. The Radicons walked out the door, motioning for=
 Infectra to come along...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilov=
ealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 4:=
09 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Infectra looked at them all* I=
nfectra: What's so horrid about this place? You must teach me, please. *Inf=
ectra sits up and looks at them waiting for some tips*
      ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Se=
nt: Thursday, June 29, 2000 11:17 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  =
    Train Wreck looks at her.

      "Amnesia? Well, it sounds to me like w=
hen we got out spark shipment from our deathmatches, somebody ripped out yo=
ur spark and snuck it in, somebody must have hated you alot, but don't worr=
y, yuor safe with us now." Train Wreck said.

      "Be careful, I tried to=
 kill a guy." Stranato said.

      "Stranato, don't worry about it!" Airbo=
mber said.

      "It seems you don't know about the war, you were peaceful=
 on Cybertron, so lets teach you what to do to stay alive on this horrid pl=
anet." Train Wreck said.

      "Yeah, first of all, ya gotta drink this st=
uff!" Stronghold said to Infectra, taking a big gulp of beer.

      "Yeah,=
 and you smoke these!" Blender said, smoking a cigar. Train Wreck walked up=
 and slapped them both in the back of the head.

      "I can help, I love =
to help!" Airbomber said. Arrow walks over and smokes a cigar, blowing some=
 smoke in Infectra's face. Train Wreck comes up behind Arrow and taps his s=
houlder. Arrow turns around and Train Wreck slaps him in the face.

      "=
Please excuse those 3 ignoramuses, they don't know any better." Train Wreck=
 said to Infectra...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: il=
ovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, June=
 29, 2000 11:05 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        *The Bots =
optics open and she looks around* Infectra:...where am I????.......the last=
 thing I remember I was seeing my friedns go plunging to the floor and then=
 this large bot sends this claw out at me....but......that's all I remember=
..... *She says to particular bot*
          ----- Original Message ----- 
=
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: =
Thursday, June 29, 2000 10:50 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  =
        OCC: I talked to Orchid and she said she wanted a new character to =
be made from Drazom, but she didn't want it to be anything like Drazom.
   =
        
          Train Wreck works on Drazom. He looks at all of the spar=
ks they had in storage.

          "Now how did this one get in here? This =
spark was never in a deathmatch!" Train Wreck said.

          "So how did =
it get in there?" Stranato asked. Train Wreck shrugged. He took the spark, =
curious to find out who it is, he put it in the former body of Drazom, whic=
h was remade into whatever Orchid wants it to be, whatever, it looks nothin=
g like Drazom. Train Wreck and the rest of the Radicons wait for the robot =
to come to life...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            Fr=
om: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: =
Thursday, June 29, 2000 10:21 PM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


=
            (OOC: I want to bring in a new character. I already have an ide=
a..)
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: THECOD=
E 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Thursday, June=
 29, 2000 9:08 PM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


             =
 Stranato was confused now, this bot seemed to die sad. First he wanted to =
die, he should have been happy, but he seemed so sad to die, the knife had =
no affect, he froze to death. Stranato sighed, this was the part of his job=
 he hated. Stranato picked up Drazom's body and carried it back to the Radi=
con's wrecked ship, which served as their base. Stranato set Drazom's body =
on a table.

              "Any way we can bring him back? We can reprogram=
 him to serve us." Stranato said.

              "I don't think so, his spa=
rk looks to be extinguished, sorry poor fellow, we couldn't save ya." Train=
 Wreck said.

              "I shouldn't have stabbed him." Stranato said.
=

              "It wasn't you who killed him, he froze to death, just sorry=
 he didn't make it." Train Wreck said.

              "No, you don't unders=
tand, I tried to kill him, I'm no better than the cold! I don't understand =
why I did something like that, maybe it was the cold." Stranato said. He si=
ghed.

              "Maybe I'm just a son of a--"

              "No, you =
are acting stupid now! Your murderer curcuits blocked out your intelligence=
 circuits and your logic circuits." Train Wreck said, interupting Stranato.=


              "I hope your right." Stranato said. Train Wreck looked at t=
he body.

              "We could always put a new spark in his body" Train=
 Wreck said. Stranato sighed and sat in the corner.

              "We coul=
d have used him, and instead we let him die and didn't save him, and I trie=
d to kill him myself." Stranato said.

              OCC: Orchid, the Radic=
ons could put a new spark from their spark collection (From deathmatches!) =
into Drazom's body if you want to have a new character with Drazoms body, O=
rchid. Orchid, I could have them change the body and you can bring in a new=
 character without having him or her look like Drazom at all, your choice, =
you can just have them get rid of his body even, just pick something, pleas=
e...
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: il=
ovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent=
: Thursday, June 29, 2000 8:37 PM
                Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wa=
rs


                *The knife hit Drazom's back. He didn't scream or anyt=
hing. It was already snowing which made him even colder. Mech fluid begins =
pouring out of his back* Drazom:............ *Drazom's head hits the ground=
. It wasn't really the knife. It was coldness. Drazom's spark fades out and=
 he lies there......and mutters one word..* Drazom:....Mantella....... *Dra=
zom's optics flicker and fade out* *He lived to love....he lived to die....=
.That was a queston that would never be answered*





                (OOC=
: Please Drazom on the Deceased bots page. as that he died from the lack of=
 emch fluid and because of how cold it was)
                  ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
                  From: THECODE 
                  To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 6:54 PM
  =
                Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                  The Radicon=
s had walked off and left Drazom, but now they were walking back and they s=
een him again. Airbomber laughed.

                  "There's the guy I sav=
ed, I wonder why he wants to die?" Airbomber asked.

                  "I d=
on't know, but I will oblige his needs!" Stranato said. Stranato walked up =
behind Drazom slowly. Stranato pulled out a knife, something he had stolen =
from the People's Base, and plunged it down, the knife screaming toward Dra=
zom's back.

                  Stronghold and Blender took a sip of their b=
eer.

                  "Why does that guy want to die, though?" Arrow aske=
d.

                  "Some bots are crazy." Train Wreck said, the 5 Radico=
ns watching Stranato...
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
                   From: ilovealllizards 
                    To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
                    Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 7:01 PM
     =
               Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                    *Drazom sl=
owly turns his head and looks at The Radicons* Drazom:....no......I must...=
die for.....my stupidity...of....messing up with......Mantella..... *Drazom=
's optics widen as he remembers something* Drazom:...hey....I'm a Pred.....=
I AM!.....kill me........*Drazom pulls hisself up by a tree limb and mech f=
luid pours out of his side and he falls back to the ground shivering from h=
ow cold it is getting from the lack of mech fluid*
                      --=
--- Original Message ----- 
                      From: THECODE 
          =
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Tuesday, Ju=
ne 27, 2000 10:59 PM
                      Subject: Neo Beast Wars


      =
                Train Wreck walked away from the battle, Plintissa and Stro=
nghold run away. Stranato, not seeing any point in continuing the battle, r=
an off with them. Scamrock followed with a grunt from being outnumbered. Ar=
tist laughed and ran after them as well.

                      "Know what =
my names gonna be now? I'm going to be Blender!" Scamrock said.

          =
            "Who cares about you?" Stranato asked. Stronghold reached out t=
o grab Stranato but he cartwheeled out of the way.

                      "=
We left that idiot Arrow in your CR Chamber, Plintissa." Stronghold said.

=
                      "WHAT!?" Stranato yelled.

                      "It'=
s my base, and Arrow is welcome to be repaired there and so are the other f=
ormer Radicons!" Plintissa yelled.

                      The Radicons nodd=
ed and walked on, Stranato grumbled out something that none of them, could =
understand. Airbomber seen them and waved to them. The People's Base's secr=
et passageway was in the nearby swamp.

                      "Get ready!" =
Train Wreck said to Airbomber.

                      "What about this guy?=
" Airbomber asked.

                      "Never mind him." Train Wreck sai=
d. Airbomber drug Drazom out of the water and ushered him to come along whi=
le he walked with his comrades.

                      Dracona was getting =
furious, and so was Gangon.

                      "Sorry Gangon, I did all=
 I could, maybe BrightBlade will still show up anyway." Dracona said. Gango=
n waited while Dracona flew away.

                      "Hey! Wait! You fo=
rgot to untie meeeee!" Gangon screamed.

                      Dracona didn=
't hear and landed next to the People's Group members. The Radicons, Plinti=
ssa, Dracona, and Artist all entered the Poeple's base through the secret p=
assage way, the computer reconizing them as friends. Train Wreck and Airbom=
ber stepped into a door.

                      "Hey, Stranato, look at thi=
s! It's amazing!" Train Wreck called out. Arrow steps out of the CR Chamber=
 all healed up.

                      "Yeah, it's got lots of beer and cig=
ars in here, too! and it's big enough to put a table in to play cards! How =
come we never noticed this room before?" Airbomber said. Stranato walked in=
to the room. Stronghold and Blender followed.

                      "Wait =
up guys!" Arrow called out, running into the room. Plintissa sealed the doo=
r magnetically upon order from Train Wreck, the Radicons were locked inside=
 the room to sort out their problems. There was alot of banging, but it eve=
ntually stopped. Alot of name calling, too. Plintissa laughed and sat down =
at a table to play cards with Dracona.

                      "Oh, man! Not=
 even a drop of beer in here! We'll dehydrate drinking water!" Stronghold s=
aid.

                      "What are we going to do? Nothing to smoke!" Bl=
ender said.

                      "I have more needs than all of you idiot=
s put together! I'm getting fat and need to exercise!" Stranato yelled.

  =
                    "How come we can't all get along! I don't like it in he=
re neither!" Arrow said. Stranato looked at him like he was going to kill h=
im. Arrow cowered in the corner.

                      "You see? That's wh=
y you fail, Arrow, you don't stand up against Stranato and his stupid rules=
! This was our idea!" Train Wreck yelled.

                      "Yeah, and=
 nobody is getting out of here until we are all friends again." Airbomber s=
aid.

                      Stranato sighed in disapointment. Arrow stood u=
p again, and started pacing the room. Stronghold and Blender started to loo=
k in cracks in the wall for something to drink, despite plenty of water in =
this room. Train Wreck was discussing something with Arrow and Airbomber, a=
nd Stronghold and Blender joined them before long.

                      "=
Say, you guys, it's really lonely sitting here with nothing to do, and--"

=
                      "Shut up and get your ass over here! Of course you ca=
n join us!" Arrow said, cutting off Stranato. Stranato walks over and sits =
with them. Stronghold pulls out a pack of playing cards.

                 =
     Plintissa and Dracona smile to each other and walk up and out of the s=
ecret passgeway, taking a walk across a field...

-------------------------=
